ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: How to conduct independent research and write a self-directed thesis.

I have not finished my essay yet, but I did spend some time doing outreach, collecting data, and applying for IRB approval. I think these are helpful skills to have as I dive deeper into independent research.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: There really needs to be more support from the department and more clear directions in what is expected of a senior essay. It would be great if we had weekly mandated sessions to work on drafts, as well as access to past papers.
The EP&E department is really poorly administered.
I am doing an off-cycle year-long essay, so some of the structure of the course didn't apply to me.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Please strongly consider doing just a semester long.
Sure! I can't tell you yet whether a two-semester EP&E essay is a good idea, but I've had a good experience so far.
